name: Huberts Creek
description:
Introduction

Huberts Creek drops into a short granitic slot canyon just below the road before opening out and flowing into the Squamish River.

This creek carries a lot of water even in the middle of summer. Chris Hood scouted the route, his information is available at the Beta Sites below.

A full descent of this canyon has never been documented.
